title: Anyone running CS and/or CS2 on Vista yet?
content:
I’m debating taking the plunge but am curious if anyone here has set up CS and/or CS2 under Vista. If so, any problems?

I have a few clients who haven’t jumped to CS2 yet, so I need to keep both suites active.

Also, how about Dreamweaver & Fireworks 8?
author: jason
